name: Lost Head Free
description:
Attention! This version may not be compatible with iPhone 7!
-----------------------------------------

Franken-Stitch has lost his head! Twist and turn your way with this physics based puzzler, and help him reunite with his glorious dome. I've heard of losing your head, but this is taking it to another level! Today is the day to make Franken-Stitch whole once more in Lost Head!

It's a hard life when your noggin won't stay sewn on your shoulders, just ask Franken-Stitch! Help him regain his head by using amazing physics on 54 awesome levels, spanning 4 unique worlds, while solving the puzzle with a few astounding interactive objects! Let the heads roll, and bring satisfaction to the sewn together heart of our friendly patchwork monster!

GAME FEATURES:
◇ 54 levels !
◇ 4 unique worlds !
◇ 27 amazing objects to collect!
◇ 10 interactive objects, making the game that much more interesting!
